text: @realDonaldTrump Trump always 10 steps ahead. Do Nothing Dems & Fake News weren't bothered w the Coronavirus less than a month ago, until they realized they could use it to smear & make Trump look bad. Election interference by any means necessary, even if it means causing panic, confusion & chaos

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
